unknown:
I didn't quite catch that, care to try again?
I couldn't quite parse that, sorry.
I don't know what you mean, sorry.
unignore: One, I'd like to interact with you!

commands.name: printAuthor
commands.description: I will reply with info about you.

commands.name: ignoreAuthor
commands.description: I will stop interacting with you.

commands.name: setAuthorReact
commands.description: Change how/when I react to your messages.

commands.name: listCommands
commands.description: I will list available text-based commands.

commands.name: listReactTypes
commands.description: I will list available options for reacting to your messages.

commands.name: setAuthorReactChance
commands.description: The chance that I will react to you.

commands.name: exceptionTest
commands.description: I will cause an exception while executing a command.

commands.name: renderMonkeys
commands.help: Do a test render of this: https://only.one.com//one.png
commands.description: I will do a test render with that image.

commands.name: renderSnap
commands.help: Snap this out of existence rotated 45 using Hexagon and distance 3.0 and size 3.0: https://only.one.com//zero.png
commands.description:
I will snap that image or video out of existence.
Optional parameters are the shape - Circle, Hexagon, Octagon, One, Tile, Triangle - the minimum distance - [1.0, 25.0] - and the size - [0.1, 20].
